dont_have_an_account: Ты еще не зарегистрирован? Тогда тебе сюда:

welcome_meta_description: Эй,Слышь! – это система обратной связи с клиентами. Узнай, чего хотят твои пользователи с помощью их комментариев и лайков.
suggest_description: Добавьте свою идею или проголосуйте за существующую. У идей с наибольшим количеством лайков больше шансов быть реализованными!

landing.header_subtitle: Эй,Слышь! — это система обратной связи с клиентами и построения дорожной карты бизнеса. Узнай, чего действительно хотят ваши пользователи с помощью их комментариев и лайков.
landing.quick_setup_text: Войди, создай проект, добавь идеи и отправь ссылку своим пользователям! Отлично-клубнично :)
landing.see_what_your_clients_want: Узнай, чего от вас хотят ваши клиенты
landing.see_what_your_clients_want_text: Принимай решения, основываясь на комментариях и лайках ваших пользователей. Сортируй идеи по популярности и составь хит-парад идей!
landing.easy_moderation_text: Авторизуйся, комментируй или удаляй идеи, помечай их как "Нам нравится", "Запланировано", "В работе", или "Выполнено".
landing.its_free_text: Зарегистрируйся сейчас, чтобы пользоваться приложением абсолютно бесплатно.
landing.unlimited_walls_text: Создавай разные проекты для сбора фидбека о приложениях, событиях или чего угодно.
landing.languages_support_text: Мы поддерживаем русский, английский, французский, немецкий и японский языки.
landing.sign_up_for_your_free_account_text: Эй,Слышь! — это проект в разработке. Зарегистрируйся сейчас и пользуйся всеми фунцкиями бесплатно до 31 января 2020 г.! :) Регистрация без кредитной карты.
landing.features_text1: Пользователи могут добавлять неограниченное число новых идей в проекты
landing.features_text2: Помечай идеи как "Нам нравится", "Запланировано", "В работе", или "Выполнено"
landing.features_text3: Создавай разные проекты для разных задач
landing.features_text4: Пользователи могут комментировать идеи друг друга
landing.features_text5: Ты можешь комментировать идеи клиентов в качестве Администратора
landing.features_text6: Мы поддерживаем русский, английский, французский, немецкий и японский языки
landing.features_text7: Можно удалить любую идею, если она повторяется или просто тебе не нравится
landing.features_text8: Сортируй по дате для просмотра свежих идей
landing.features_text9: Безопасная передача данных между браузером и сервером
landing.features_text10: Пользователи могут ставить лайки на понравившиеся идеи
landing.features_text11: Сортируй по количеству лайков для просмотра самых популярных идей
landing.features_text12: Получай уведомления по e-mail, когда в твоем проекте появляются новые идеи
landing.no_but_i_have_an_idea: Нет, но мне есть что предложить!
landing.its_a_free_beta_text:
Проект Эй,Слышь! находится в разработке, и мы предлагаем зарегистрироваться и пользоваться им бесплатно

Первые 100 пользователей получат бесплатные обновления до 31 января 2020 г.!
landing.small_businesses_text: Получай обратную связь от своих клиентов и эффективно развивай свой бизнес
landing.software_developers_text: Приоритизируй свои задачи, основываясь на потребностях твоих пользователей. Будь в курсе, если что-то отвалилось
landing.marketers_text: Принимай правильные решения с помощью обратной связи, полученной напрямую от твоей целевой аудитории

gifs.alt: Quelsoft, Annuaire des solutions informatiques professionnelles

featured_in_links.alt: Quelsoft, Annuaire des solutions informatiques professionnelles

landing.abous_us_content:
Мы создали CopyTrans – программы на Windows, позволяющие легко и с радостью работать с данными iPhone.

Мы породили Эй,Слышь!, чтобы получать обратную связь от пользователей прямо из наших программ.

Мы рады поделиться с вами нашим созданием! Надеемся, вам нравится?
landing.contact_us_content:
Ursa Minor Ltd

1st Floor Felix House, 24 Dr. Joseph Rivière

11602 Port Louis, Mauritius

Email: hello@heylisten.app
landing.frequently_asked_questions_description: Мы действительно верим, что Эй,Слышь! поможет вам приблизиться к своим клентам и улучшить ваши продукты. Читай рубрику Часто Задаваемые Впоросы, чтобы разобраться, как это работает.

privacy_chapters.title: General
paragraphs: Please read this License Agreement (the “Agreement”) before using the https://heylisten.app website (the “Service”) operated by Ursa Minor Ltd. (“Ursa Minor”).

By accessing and using the Service, User indicates their complete and unconditional acceptance of the Agreement. If User disagrees with any part of the License Agreement, then they may not access the Service.
The information contained in the Service is subject to change without notice and does not represent a commitment or contracted obligation on the part of Ursa Minor.
User agrees to use the Service in accordance with the Agreement. Ursa Minor may amend or modify the Agreement at any time.

privacy_chapters.title: Subscription and Free Trial
paragraphs: While in Beta stage, Ursa Minor agrees to provide the Service free of charge. The first 100 Users get all features free of charge until January 1, 2020. At any time and without notice, Ursa Minor reserves the right to modify the terms and conditions of the offer or cancel it.

privacy_chapters.title: Content
paragraphs: The Service allows to post, link, store, share and otherwise make available certain information and text (the "Content"). A User is responsible for the Content posted to the Service, including its legality, reliability, and appropriateness.

By posting Content to the Service, User grants Ursa Minor the right and license to use, modify, publicly perform, publicly display, reproduce such Content on and through the Service. User retains all rights to the Content submitted, posted or displayed on or through the Service and responsible for protecting those rights. User agrees that this license includes the right for Ursa Minor to make Content available to other Users of the Service.

privacy_chapters.title: Accounts
paragraphs: User is obligated to provide Ursa Minor with information that is accurate, complete and up-to-date upon creating an account. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of User’s account on the Service.

User is responsible for safeguarding the password that is used to access the Service and for any activities or actions under the password. User agrees not to disclose the password to any third party. User is obligated to notify Ursa Minor immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use of the account.

User may not use as a username the name of another person or entity or that is not lawfully available for use, a name or trademark that is subject to any rights of another person or entity without appropriate authorization, or a name that is otherwise offensive, vulgar or obscene.

privacy_chapters.title: Copyright Policy
paragraphs: Ursa Minor respects the intellectual property rights of others. Ursa Minor will respond to any claim that Content posted on the Service infringes the copyright or other intellectual property infringement ("Infringement") of any person.

If you are a copyright owner or authorized on behalf of one, and you believe that the copyrighted work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement that is taking place through the Service, you must submit your notice to hello@heylisten.app and include a detailed description of the alleged Infringement in your notice.
You may be held accountable for damages (including costs and attorneys' fees) for misrepresenting that any Content is infringing your copyright.

privacy_chapters.title: Intellectual Property
paragraphs: The Service and its original content (excluding Content provided by Users), features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Ursa Minor and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both Mauritius and foreign countries. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of Ursa Minor.

privacy_chapters.title: Links To Other Web Sites
paragraphs: The Service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by Ursa Minor.

Ursa Minor has no control over and assumes no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party web sites or services. User acknowledges and agrees that Ursa Minor shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such web sites or services.
We strongly advise you to read the terms and conditions and privacy policies of any third-party web sites or services that you visit.

privacy_chapters.title: Termination
paragraphs: Ursa Minor may terminate or suspend User’s account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation of breaching the Terms.
Upon termination, User’s right to use the Service will immediately cease. If User wishes to terminate their account, you may simply discontinue using the Service.

privacy_chapters.title: Limitations of Liability
paragraphs: Ursa Minor disclaims any and all liability for incidental or consequential damages arising out of the use or operation of or inability to use the Service, even if Ursa Minor has been advised of the possibility of such damages. Furthermore, the User indemnifies and agrees to hold Ursa Minor harmless from such claims.

privacy_chapters.title: Copyright Notices
paragraphs: The Service is the property of Ursa Minor. All rights for the Service belong to Ursa Minor. These rights are not transferred as part of this Agreement.

privacy_chapters.title: Limitations of Use
paragraphs: The User may not copy or use the Service in any way, in whole or in part. The User may not modify, reverse engineer, decompile the Service or modify or reproduce the Service documentation.

privacy_chapters.title: Place of Jurisdiction
paragraphs: Ursa Minor is a registered Mauritian company and this agreement is governed by Mauritian laws.
February 26, 2019
Ursa Minor Ltd
24 Dr Joseph Rivière
Port Louis
Mauritius

faq_chapters.title: Get started
faq_chapters.content:
To start using Hey,Listen! you have to sign up first by clicking the Sign Up button. On the sign-up page, please fill in the registration form: your e-mail address, your name, and a password. All fields are required.

Please make sure that you store the password in a safe place, but don’t worry if you forget it! You can always reset your password using your e-mail address.

Your email address will also be used to send you notifications, e.g. when a new idea is added to one of your projects. You can use the same account to manage your projects from any device and share the admin rights with your colleagues.

faq_chapters.title: Create a project
faq_chapters.content:
Welcome to your workspace – a place where you can create different projects for your websites, apps, products, businesses, etc.

Go ahead and create your first project. To do that, you must choose a name for the project and a short URL. Just enter the name and you will see that the short URL was generated automatically.

This short URL (also called as a slug) is a part of a Link you will send to your clients or use for your software/website. It’s a good idea to keep it nice and consistent so you will have no mix-ups in the future.

When done, visit your project by clicking on its name or on the eye icon.

You can edit the project name and the short URL any time – just click on the pencil icon to modify them.

faq_chapters.title: Name your workspace
faq_chapters.description: What is workspace? How to rename it
faq_chapters.content:
The workspace name is generated randomly and is just a combination of numbers and letters. To make it clearer, you can set a special name for your workspace. It will also be a part of the Link, so you can use your company name or anything else that makes sense to you.

To edit the workspace name, please click on your profile → Settings.

Attention: if you have already shared this link on your website or sent it to your clients, don't forget to update it according to your changes!

faq_chapters.title: Add an idea
faq_chapters.content:
A little tip: nobody likes to be the first person on the dancefloor, so we highly recommend adding your own ideas at the very beginning. When the first users land on your page they can already check out some suggestions and like them or get inspired to leave new ideas.

To create an idea, click on the "I have an idea!" button and explain in a few words what's on your mind. If you want to give some additional details, use the comments field below. When you are ready, click on the Submit button. Your idea will be published on your project page.

faq_chapters.title: Add a comment
faq_chapters.content:
Communication is the key! Click on the idea title to read and post comments. If you want to post an official reply, make sure that you are logged in, so you will comment as Admin.

Tip: Want to comment anonymously? Copy the URL of your idea and open it in a browser where you are not logged in. You can now comment as a user!

faq_chapters.title: Like an idea
faq_chapters.content:
Under each idea, you can see a small heart icon. You can support any idea with a like and unlike it if you ever change your mind.

Likes are important to get the idea to the Top.

faq_chapters.title: Sort ideas
faq_chapters.content:
By default, the ideas are sorted by the number of likes (except for those that are tagged as Most likely to be implemented). It’s called the Top section.

You can click on 'New' to sort the ideas in chronological order and stay updated on the latest news. You decide.

faq_chapters.title: Tag ideas
faq_chapters.content:
Another way to communicate with the clients is tags. Tags ensure full transparency of your decisions and show your engagement in solving the issues. You can select one of the 4 tags:

  • Planned
  • Done
  • Work in progress
  • Most likely to be implemented

faq_chapters.title: Manage your projects
faq_chapters.description: How to create, edit, and delete projects
faq_chapters.content: While you are logged in as an Admin, you have the power to delete ideas or comments. You can also edit the name and a short URL of the project and even delete it if you don’t need it anymore.

faq_chapters.title: Plans & payments
faq_chapters.content:
Currently, Hey,Listen! offers a free trial period for the first 100 users. During this Trial you may use all features of Hey,Listen! for free - no charges will apply, and no credit card required.

The app will stay free of charge for the mentioned 100 subscribers till January 31, 2020. When the Trial period is over, certain features of Hey,Listen! might become paid. You will be notified 2 weeks in advance about the expiration of your Trial period.

You can then downgrade to a free plan, upgrade to a paid plan with additional features or search for another option.

We are constantly improving Hey,Listen to meet your expectations. If you have any suggestions, don’t hesitate to leave your comments on demo page.

project_page.registration_greeting:
Спасибо за регистрацию! Пользуйся бесплатно на здоровье до 31 января 2020 🙂

Мы пришлем тебе напоминалку за две недели до окончания пробного периода.

А там разберешься - переходить на платный план или продолжать пользоваться Эй,Слышь! бесплатно.
